snippet: Deron Williams scored a franchise-record 57 points to lift the visiting Nets to a 104-101 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Sunday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; New Jersey Nets defeat Charlotte Bobcats, 104-101; Nets guard Deron Williams scores a franchise-record 57 points; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams scored a franchise-record 57 points to lift the visiting Nets to a 104-101 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Sunday night.

headline.seo: Williams Scores Team-Record 57 in Nets Win
headline.main: Williams Scores Team-Record 57 in Nets Win
headline.print_headline: Williams Scores Team-Record 57 in Nets Win
